name: Lead Product Manager (Head of Product), Customer Service
description:
We are looking for Lead Product Manager to be responsible for Customer Service stream (including both B2C and B2B platforms). You will work closely with engineering, analytics and UX/UI design teams, as well as business owners. Main scope - Customer Service Platform.

What you will do:

  • Development of the new Customer Service platform, both for buyers and sellers
  • Determine the product strategy, key milestones and resources needed
  • Manage key product streams
  • Customer interaction channels (Application chat, Messengers, Voice etc)
  • Contact-centre tools (operators' workflow and balancing workload)
  • Robotisation and automation support scenarios and scripts (ML-bases, chat bots etc)
  • Prepare product requirements for software engineering teams
  • Coordinate product launches and control crucial metrics
  • Perform retrospective meetings and support further product development

Candidate profile:

  • At least 4 year of Product Management experience (preferably in E-Com or Classifieds)
  • Strong analytics skills (ideally to have good SQL knowledge and Power BI / Tableau skills)
  • Excellent project management skills
  • Excellent knowledge of digital and e-comm business metrics
  • Experience in working in agile teams (Business – Product – Engineering)
  • Ability to confront business / tech pressure and find win-win solutions
  • People management experience will be a plus

What we offer:

  • Work for one of world's biggest IT companies in Russia;
  • Comfortable office in Moscow City with limitless fruits and coffee;
  • Competitive salary with performance-based bonuses;
  • Mac or Windows laptop of your choice;
  • Corporate medical insurance.
